• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and interact with others.
  • The game features a procedurally generated underground world with various ores, a shop system for upgrades, and a teleporter network for fast travel.
  • Players can mine, build structures, transfer resources, and chat with others in real-time using an MQTT-based networking system.
    const GameEngine = new GameEngine();
    const InputManager = new InputManager();

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated worlds, resource collection, equipment upgrades, and real-time player interaction. Players dig through various layers of earth to find ores, upgrade their mining capabilities, and explore an underground network of teleporters for fast travel. The game includes a shop system for purchasing upgrades and supplies, a dashboard for inventory management, and supports both desktop and mobile controls.
